It’s been really challenging for me to get commissions in the last two years as well… I think maybe people have less disposable income since COVID and it impacts commission affordability ):
A collection of rat and rat-adjacent drawings

Another very dear original character, Adrienne. She’s rough around the edges and appears not to take much seriously, but she’s dedicated and has a good heart. She likes motorcycles and toying with electrical circuitry

Old, very dear character of mine, Seth. He’s an ex-park ranger with an affinity for gardening, being a dad, and black coffee. He’s also working through some pretty existential depression in the post apocalypse
Little colored sketch of the mythical bird-dog Simurgh, a benevolent legendary beast from Persian myth.
